Selective Dissemination of MARC: A User Evaluation .A Buhr, Lorne R. After outlining the terms of reference of an investigation of user reaction to the selective dissemination of MARC records, a summary of the types of users is given.. User response is analyzed and interpreted in the light of recent developments at the Library of Congress.. Implications for the future of SDI of MARC in a university setting conclude the paper.. .X 18	2	870 34	1	870 49	1	870 53	1	870 57	1	870 59	1	870 75	1	870 91	1	870 125	1	870 145	1	870 164	1	870 176	1	870 202	1	870 211	1	870 213	2	870 224	2	870 243	1	870 329	1	870 378	1	870 382	1	870 421	2	870 439	1	870 440	2	870 452	1	870 453	1	870 465	1	870 466	1	870 467	1	870 468	1	870 490	1	870 491	1	870 495	1	870 506	2	870 507	1	870 508	1	870 510	1	870 511	1	870 512	2	870 514	1	870 517	1	870 520	1	870 521	1	870 523	1	870 524	1	870 526	1	870 528	1	870 565	1	870 572	1	870 576	1	870 580	2	870 591	1	870 595	2	870 596	1	870 603	1	870 604	2	870 608	1	870 609	2	870 612	1	870 619	2	870 622	2	870 623	2	870 629	2	870 631	1	870 632	1	870 633	2	870 639	1	870 659	1	870 676	1	870 696	1	870 699	1	870 700	1	870 705	1	870 707	1	870 711	1	870 722	1	870 723	2	870 726	2	870 727	2	870 728	2	870 729	1	870 730	2	870 731	2	870 732	1	870 754	1	870 809	2	870 810	2	870 812	2	870 813	4	870 814	3	870 820	2	870 822	2	870 828	1	870 866	1	870 870	5	870 873	1	870 879	1	870 894	1	870 928	1	870 963	1	870 990	1	870 991	1	870 1078	1	870 1089	1	870 1091	2	870 1143	1	870 1255	1	870 1264	1	870 1283	1	870 1298	2	870 1299	1	870 1302	1	870 1303	1	870 1363	1	870 1366	2	870 1367	2	870 1368	2	870 1396	3	870 1413	1	870 1445	1	870 1445	1	870
